alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 16 at 10:49PM EST until December 17 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Georgia, including the following areas, Coastal Bryan, Coastal Chatham, Coastal Liberty, Coastal McIntosh, Inland Bryan, Inland Chatham, Inland Liberty, Inland McIntosh and Long and southeast South Carolina, including the following areas, Beaufort, Charleston, Coastal Colleton, Coastal Jasper, Dorchester, Inland Berkeley, Inland Colleton, Inland Jasper and Tidal Berkeley. * WHEN...Through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread heavy rains will develop across the region late tonight into Sunday as a strong nor`easter impacts the region. Rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches can be expected. There will be a risk for flash flooding has heavy rains could occur around high tide tide Sunday morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper; Tidal Berkeley
